welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ville-d'Avray, a charming city known for its tranquil parks, historic monuments, and picturesque views. We hope you have a delightful stay and take the time to explore and indulge in the city's beauty."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of airlines including Air France and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) and serving a variety of airlines including British Airways and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free unlimited wifi is available throughout the airport.
